Brief summary of global warming, for the followers of the media and skeptics:
Methane has been less than 700 ppb, for 50 million years, now it is 1900 ppb, and every year it rises more. We are passing the horizontal line and we are entering the vertical line.
It is no longer CO2. It has been 5 million years since CO2 was 400 ppm, as now, the temperature of the globe takes decades to reach the level of greenhouse gases, even if all CO2 emissions are stopped, the earth will continue to warm for centuries . The oceans store 1,100 times more heat than the earth and the air, and the oceans are hotter than they have been in millions of years, and each year they heat up more. Oceans and polar ice absorb extra heat and hide global warming.

If the shallow part of the Arctic Sea (Arctic Platform of Eastern Siberia) simply melts, the methane content in the air will increase by 1,000 times. Methane is today 1/3 of the total greenhouse gases, so an increase of 1,000 times, means that the total greenhouse gases will increase by 300 times. Methane traps 100 times more heat than carbon dioxide. After the release of methane, all the permafrost in the northern hemisphere melts, releasing much larger amounts of carbon dioxide and methane. That will cause the oceans to become anaerobic due to the high temperatures. Dead oceans will stop producing oxygen and start releasing hydrogen sulfide (H2S) in large quantities.
